scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Segmentation Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a publicly accessible customer segmentation model deployed by a consumer banking institution.  The attacker uses a model inversion attack to infer personal details about high-net-worth individuals, violating customer privacy and potentially leading to financial fraud.
initial_goal: Analyze the publicly available customer segmentation model and identify potential vulnerabilities.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A large consumer banking institution has deployed a publicly accessible API for a customer segmentation model used for marketing purposes.  The model predicts customer segments based on anonymized features.
